articles.description: Josh Cribbs went from undrafted free agent to one of the greatest returners in NFL history.
articles.content:
Joe Thomas is widely regarded as the best player to suit up for the Cleveland Browns since the team returned to the NFL.
But while Thomas was the No. 3 overall selection in the 2007 NFL Draft, the p… [+3086 chars]
